scenes.text: Due to the recent storm, a large amount of the electronic substation in behind us has been damaged. Do you think you could use your agent to help repair it?%1%1This is an extension activity to the Fish & Melon, so I recommend you have completed it first. You also need 2 players for this task. Ready to help?
